law.text: If any railroad company fails to comply with any order of the fiscal court issued under authority of KRS 178.350 to 178.385 or with a final judgment of the Circuit Court or Court of Appeals, the county through its fiscal court may cause to be instituted in the Circuit Court of the county an action to compel compliance with the order by mandatory process of the court.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 8, effective June 19, 1952.
